title: Drawing, "Mark Cross Logo, Textile Design", ca. 1935
medium: Brush and gouache on paper, lined.
description: Tan background, nine squares alternating "cross" with geometric designs in white.

Drawing, "Mark Cross Logo, Textile Design", ca. 1935.
